Onze producten komen in hersluitbare gla: Our products come in reclosable 500ml glass bottles and contain an alcohol percentage of 17%.
Maak kennis met Madam Cherry: zij brengt: Meet Madam Cherry: she brings the sweet love of apple and cherry to you. With her strong character, she will conquer your heart.
Lady Barbara brengt een unieke smaak doo: Lady Barbara brings a unique taste through her mix of rhubarb and apple. This way you can taste her elegant character.
Deze knappe dame is Miss Ginger. Zij ove: This pretty lady is Miss Ginger. She convinces you with her refreshing mix of apple, ginger and a subtle touch of citrus.
Duchess Fran, deze chique dame neemt jou: Duchess Fran, this chic lady takes you on a tasteful audience. A royal combination of raspberry and apple.
